articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: This is the personal blog of **Pablo Tercero**
articles.contents:
I’m a Data Scientist at James Hardie Building Products based out of Chicago, IL
For as long as I can remember I have been passionate about data science, statistics and programming.
My interests are all things R/RStudio , Python , machine/deep learning and web development. I enjoy chess and golf.

            Welcome to my personal website!
            I’m a Data Scientist at James Hardie Building Products based out of Chicago, IL. I’m passionate about all things R , Python, machine/deep learning and web development. Of particular interest to me are forecasting techniques and libraries as I have spent a few years of my professional career in demand planning. Check out my about page for more about me, and explore the site menu to view my blog posts.
